attributes.action: Please enforce Construction and use laws  on the use of Agricultural Trailers pulled by Tractors on Public  A roads.
attributes.additional_details:
Please clarify the law  for Agricultural tractors  pulling trailers  full of fresh  grass clippings.

They often travel at slow speeds ( 20 mph)  with no registration plates on the trailers.  The trailers often do not have  fully operational lights or indicators.

Please ask the police  and other agencies  to stop  and check  the  lights and brakes of these units.

Please ban these grass carrying trailers from  "A" class roads.
